title: [Self-Directed] Understanding Redox Reactions Through Mobile Augmented Reality (AR)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic chemistry concepts (elements, compounds, ions) and ability to express chemical reactions
context.additional_context: Interactive learning environments using digital devices, supporting multisensory learning through AR content

learning_goals: Learners can explain electron transfer processes in redox reactions using AR visualization.
Learners analyze oxidation number change rules with 80% accuracy through AR simulations of real chemistry laboratory scenes.
Learners accurately write over 10 redox reaction equations using an AR quiz module.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
